description: Listed Building Consent in connection with the demolition of the existing derelict single-storey brick shed. Construction of a single storey, 2 double bedroomed house.  (Listed Building Consent application reference P120600 also submitted).
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: Details and samples of all facing materials shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority prior to any superstructure work commencing on site. 
(a) Detailed drawings at scale 1:5 of all new windows including reveals, cills and heads,
(b) Drawings  at a scale 1:100  in plan and section showing drainage proposals.
(c) Drawing of elevation at scale of 1:100 showing anyproposed flues vents.
(d) Sample of zinc roofing material.
(e) Detail drawings from a structural engineer of the construction of the structural support of the building  

The development shall be carried out strictly in accordance with the details so approved and maintained as such thereafter. 

REASON: In order to safeguard the special architectural or historic interest of the heritage asset in accordance with policies 7 and 12 of the National Planning Policy Framework 2012 and policy CS9 of the Islington Core Strategy 2011.
